question: muxuu kahadlayaa documentgaan
answer: Jawaab:  Dookumentigu wuxuu ka hadlayaa nidaam casri ah oo la socda buugga "Empowering Women in Tech" kaas oo ujeedadiisu tahay in buugga looga dhigo mid la heli karo, la isku xiri karo, iyo mid wax laga barto online.  Wuxuu sharxayaa qaybaha muhiimka ah ee nidaamkan, sida bogga hore, akhriska buugga online, casharro video, forum, quizzes, tababarro online ah, profiles, iyo xiriir.  Sidoo kale wuxuu sharxayaa faa'iidooyinka nidaamka iyo ujeedada guud.
